Text: The show just isn't funny anymore

the show isn't "Laugh Out Loud" funny anymore, you're right, but I still find it interesting to listen to. 
I'm still a fan!

Yeah, it isn't LOL funny all the time but it has it's moments.  But Stern sometimes just bitches about his criticizers, his employers and  belittles his staff for no reason.....which is all getting old since he does it all the time now.
thank you wush! long live stern!
